Skill.label: Boots - 4L Vaal skills !GRACE ONLY FOR VAAL SKILL!

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IS YOUR TWITCH PRIME BACK?
Hello guys,
Please read this before getting into the build.
Auras are a massive pain in the ass to all fit in but this setup should work well, you'll run into issues when you're in the lower levels but I really want you to sit down and think about possible variations of the build (like hubris circlet with mana reserve etc..., different enchants etc...)
First, yes, it's an EXCELLENT build despite the nerfs, we're not really affected too much. Purpose of this build : Power farm T16 maps, guardians, conquerors, bosses, Sirus, Simulacrums, Delve, everything man.
BUDGET OF THIS VERSION : 30ex
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ LEVELLING
Hollow Palm Technique + Astramentis (Utmost Swiftness annointed) + Briskwarp should carry
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
JEWELS : 3 Larges, 6 mediums, 1 small
LARGES.
Several combinations, you NEED 8 passives only, not 9 or 10, EIGHT. Scintillating Idea + Vengeful commander + 2 jewel sockets (expensive) Blanketed Snow + Vengeful commander + 2 jewel sockets (medium expensive) Any elemental + Vengeful commander + 2 jewel sockets (can be dirt cheap)
MEDIUMS.
4 or 5 passives | Heraldry + Purposeful Harbinger + jewel socket. I recommend going with 4 of them, 5 if you're struggling with mana reservation. 4 or 5 passives | Endbringer + Purposeful Harbinger + Jewel socket. 2 or 1 depending on above
SMALL.
We need 2 types :
2 Passives 6% Energy shield base -> Conservation of Energy - Gives us LEECH YAY and 8% ES, that's dank 2 Passives 15%to X res -> Pure Guile or Pure Aptitude. Gives us 30%e reduced reservation on purity of ice OR lightning so we don't need helm enchant. Any helm enchant works but non works too. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- HELMET : Lots of questions about the helmet, you can use either THE VERTEX, gives you one free level on your auras + Enlighten so it frees up a small -1% mana reserved jewel CROWN OF THE INWARD EYE (Over 18% roll), tons of ES, mana and damage, really cheap and good. RARE HUBRIS CIRCLET with a ton of ES works too ENCHANT : EK Damage is good, EK proj speed is VERY expensive, you can corrupt a ton of Crown of the inward eye since it's so cheap
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
RINGS :
1 with Herald of Thunder/Strength and 1 open prefix 1 with Assassin's mark/ES/ 1 open prefix OR You can also get Elder ring with Herald of Ash and swap the gem around. (probably cheaper)
You need to find a trusted craft to craft you -8 to -9 reduced mana cost of non-channelled skills (4c craft) then if you have Fertile Catalyst, it'll take it to -10 at 11% quality. It's BIG for mana sustain ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GLOVES :
Maligaro's Virtuosity is INSANE for dps but it's very expensive, check if you have "The Betrayal" card and see if completing a set. Also saves 3 point and jewel points since you unspec out of Arcane Potency. If not, Shadows and Dust are good but you NEED to spend 3 points in Arcane potency. You don't need crit multi jewels if you're using those gloves.
IF YOU DO NOT USE MALIGARO, USE SHADOWS AND DUST AND CRIT MULTI JEWELS + ARCANE POTENCY.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BOOTS : ES boots with 70% Mana regen enchant is really good, you either run some labs or buy Sin Treks with the enchant.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MANA ISSUES : If you follow this setup perfectly you should be able ditch the mana flask, you can then replace it with a BASALT flask of heart for extra tankiness
YOU NEED : Ring of blade (try to get a Reduced mana reserved or corrupted blood one) YOU NEED : 2 reduced mana reserved jewels, preferably : %inc mana + crit multi for spells corrupted YOU KINDA NEED : Watcher's Eye with Hatred conversion to cold (5/6ex atm) YOU WANT : to fill up the rest of your jewels with %maximum energy shield + crit multi for spells or you can get some good combinations of small clusters.
This is the boss setup but should still be very fast (8 casts a second, 231% move speed WITHOUT vaal haste (280 ms with it)
For Sirus you can also get a good pair of ES gloves with 150+ ES and Physical to cold conversion, tons of damage.
There you go, have fun and come say hi when I'm live!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok so now that you read all this and put the character together, you're fucking ready to blast.
Here's the secret MAP STRAT OF SOMAYD.
First you need to finish you 32 watchstones to get all the benefits from farming Awakener 8 levels map bosses.
Then,
T14 : Triple favorite Burial chambers T15 : Triple favorite your favorite t15 (for me, it's phantasmagoria) T16 : You either triple favorite a map you like, or none.
What do you run tho? Promenade! Make your promenades big (chisels, alch, 4 sextants) and run them over and over, really good splinters, really good exp, really good map returns.
When you run out of Promenade, just orb of horizon any other t16 that you have in stash, it's really easy to get.
Then the money comes from spamming 3 to 5 Sirus 8 per day running just 1 map.
Sell you guardian fragments, your elder fragments and any Synthesis map that you drop. NO GAMBLING HERE SIR.
Then if you just started the build and aren't confident in your Sirus 8 capabilities, then you removes a bunch of watchstones before talking to zana (like lvl 4 should be really easy) and make it harder as you get better.
And then for more money, you can start fully juicy the burials that you found while leveling with my current MF setup (2 white socket Pariah + Greedtrap) or just sell them for 20c each.
Don't forget to check PoE ninja for which gem you should level in off hands.
